text:
Jennifer Aniston's Style Decoded

Jennifer Aniston has an effortless and timeless style that has become one that we would love to replicate in our own closets. We’ve broken her style down for you here so you can get your wardrobe one step closer to celebrity status. (Don’t worry… you’ll get used to the flash bulbs.)

Less is More

Jennifer knows what works for her and she repeats styles and colors across different looks. Her pallet is neutral which allows for a lot of versatility with her pieces.

Know When to Tuck

As we’ve emphasized in our blog post, How to Tuck in Your Shirt, the right tuck can make or break your outfit. Jennifer utilizes the simple front tuck for an effortless and casual vibe and the full tuck to create a refined and sophisticated look.

Accessorize to Maximize Style

The right accessories take a simple look from basic and boring to stylish and chic. What’s great about starting with a simple base is that it allows for a variety of accessories from simple to statement, and it also allows you to showcase your individual style.

Do the Unexpected

While Jennifer’s style is mostly simple neutrals, she tends to add in a piece from time to time that is outside of the norm. Keep it interesting by adding a pattern, a pop of color or a statement accessory.

Mix it Up

Pairing a classic or preppy piece with a fashion-forward or trend piece is something you’ll find throughout Jennifer’s looks. Select a top and accessories that you would typically wear to work with slacks and instead, wear it with destructed denim.

Tell your stylist to refine your look or help you create a new one. Create a Front Door Fashion Pinterest board with your favorite styles, celebrities and more to help her get it just right. Get started today!
